title: 环球市场
author: 翟昊楠
txt_content:
哪个是上架一个物品收钱的数量啊 求解
server:
  enable: false
automatic_payments: false
enable_cut: true
cut_amount: 0.05
enable_metrics: true
max_price: 0.0
creation_fee: 0.0
queue:
  trade_time: 0
  mail_time: 0
  queue_mail_on_buy: true
  queue_on_cancel: true
max_listings_per_player: 5
expire_time: 168
price_check:
  enable: true
infinite:
  seller: Server
  account: ''
notify_on_update: true
blacklist:
  item_name:
  - Transaction Log
  - Market History
  item_id:
    '0': 0
  enchant_id: []
  enchant_lore: []
  use_with_mail: false

replies.author: syrupofonlyone
replies.txt_content: creation_fee: 0.0 来设置价格，如果是0.1的哈，就是上架100的东西，收税10
